title: [HOLD for payment 2024-07-25] [$250] Split- Unknown user profile loads infinitely when opening from split confirmation page offline
issue_repo_steps:
Action performed: 1. Go to staging.new.expensify.com
2. Go offline.
3. Go to FAB > Split expense > Scan.
4. Upload a receipt.
5. Select an unknown account (non-existing account or never interacted with before account).
6. Proceed to confirmation page.
7. Click on the unknown account.

Expected result: The user profile of the unknown account will not load infinitely.

Actual result: None
